testsuite.name: Test Login Functionality
testsuite.system-out:
Scenario: Successfull Login # src/test/resources/Funtionaltest/QTripLogin.feature:5 Given Enter Username and Password # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.enter_username_and_password() When Send Post Request with Valid Endpoint # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.send_post_request_with_valid_endpoint() {"success":true,"data":{"token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6ImthbHlhbmkyMzI1QGdtYWlsLmNvbSIsImlhdCI6MTczMzI0OTkxNiwiZXhwIjoxNzMzMjcxNTE2fQ.68Ly_6Yw7RwYvBBfJ2wBGk3G3CMHYSSMQdgN3P3rNBM","id":"vBI3fX1uJHF0OQ7z"}} 201 Then Validate Statucode Should be 201 # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_statucode_should_be(java.lang.Integer) eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6ImthbHlhbmkyMzI1QGdtYWlsLmNvbSIsImlhdCI6MTczMzI0OTkxNiwiZXhwIjoxNzMzMjcxNTE2fQ.68Ly_6Yw7RwYvBBfJ2wBGk3G3CMHYSSMQdgN3P3rNBM And Get the Token details # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.get_the_token_details()
Scenario: Login with Unregistered User # src/test/resources/Funtionaltest/QTripLogin.feature:11 Given Enter Unregistered Username and Password # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.enter_unregistered_username_and_password(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | email | password | | kal235@gmail.com | Test@123 | When Send Post Request with Valid Endpoint # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.send_post_request_with_valid_endpoint() {"success":true,"data":{"token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6ImthbHlhbmkyMzI1QGdtYWlsLmNvbSIsImlhdCI6MTczMzI0OTkyMCwiZXhwIjoxNzMzMjcxNTIwfQ._hB6TuftkH8X5LqUrEaQjiqwcA_RvhSc5jsGbuQpu8g","id":"vBI3fX1uJHF0OQ7z"}} 201 Then Validate Statucode Should be 201 # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_statucode_should_be(java.lang.Integer) {"success":true,"data":{"token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6ImthbHlhbmkyMzI1QGdtYWlsLmNvbSIsImlhdCI6MTczMzI0OTkyMCwiZXhwIjoxNzMzMjcxNTIwfQ._hB6TuftkH8X5LqUrEaQjiqwcA_RvhSc5jsGbuQpu8g","id":"vBI3fX1uJHF0OQ7z"}} true And Validate Response Body # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_response_body()
